name: Froggies At The Zoo
description:
Super simple game similar to Pokémon Snap. Take cute pictures of frogs and see the end results when the lap is completed! Five different frog types to picture just a simple relaxing game!

This was made for: https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-79-frogs

Controls:

Mouse to move camera

Left Click to take photos

Hold Right Click for fixed zoom

Mouse Wheel for a manual zoom
